movies.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

jump_scares.spoiler: A blue light appears in the fireplace out of nowhere and makes a loud sound
A glowing white figure appears in the camera, which startles Mike
One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face
During a dream, Tricia approaches her husband who has his back turned to her. He suddenly turns around and is shown to be missing his eyes
Tricia suddenly has a vision of her husband as she closes the door
While lying in bed, Tricia has a vision of her husband kneeling over her
Tricia sees her husband standing behind the lawyer
While meditating, Tricia hallucinates that her husband is beside her whispering in her ear
There is a strange chirping noise in the room next to Daniel and Callie, seconds later a large insect like creature crawls past
As Callie investigates the bathroom, something comes out from behind the shower curtain and the screen goes black
The insectoid briefly appears out of the darkness before the screen goes black again
The girl turns around and a figure in a cape stands behind her
When the girl closes the door, a figure in a cape appears behind her
After Helena comes out of the room, the camera zooms in and the cape-wearing figure appears from the room and grabs her. Very similar to the jump scare in Exorcist 3, but not at all effective
Riley is suddenly grabbed by Professor Gelson as she looks in the window
When the girl turns on the light, a man in a mask is next to her
When Riley says “Oh my” suddenly an arrow flies past her
Kris sneaks through the kitchen. On the table you can already see a man standing with a cape. When he jumps down, a loud noise is heard
Suddenly someone bangs on the car window as Kris stands in front of the house
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
Accompanied by a loud sound effect, the camera quickly pans to show Peeping Tom’s feet stepping in front of Feldman
As Feldman looks up, Peeping Tom suddenly jumps up right in front of the camera
Uri pretends that something has grabbed his hand in the water
Paul touches a mutated fish and it moves
A bear appears in the hallway and charges at the group
Paul bangs on the van window
Several dogs jump at the van windows
There is a loud bang on the van
A small fish splashes in a pond which startles the group
As Amanda reaches for the gun, the creature suddenly moves
Something falls down beside Paul
Something breaks the van window
A chair hits a wall and breaks
A distressed Natalie appears around a corner
Amanda shines the torch on a dead guard hanging upside down
A mutated creature jumps out from underneath a blanket. [Video]
A creature attacks Amanda from behind
Amanda is suddenly attacked by a large group of mutated creatures. [Video]
An enraged man comes out of the darkness
A dog barks
The boy on the swing suddenly turns around and lunges at the group
A man snarls behind Clay
Clay opens a door and a woman lunges at him
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
After Sara leaves the toilet Aaron jumps out and screams at her (as a joke)
Aaron attempts to scare Sara again as he jumps out from around a corner
Aaron opens the shower curtain in another attempt to scare Sara however she scares him first by screaming at him while wearing tape on her face
Sarah pops up in front of a window to scare Aaron
Aaron drops the camera at the base of a tree
Sara suddenly runs at Aaron while screaming
A man gets sliced into chunks by one of the traps
A silhoutte runs past the camera
A woman runs out of the darkness and shrieks
Guy’s bloody hand grabs the side of the metro door
Kate looks around the corner and there is a cut to a dog that’s barking at her
Kate touches a sleeping man, frightening him and causing him to bolt upwards
The security guard is grabbed by the killer from behind
Jimmy is grabbed by the killer from above
A dead body rises from the water
Kate turns the flashlight back on and the killer is right in front of the camera. (No accompanying sound.
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
As Sloane hides in the apartment, suddenly the phone on the table rings
Sloane is pulled forward under the table
As Gwen walks through her apartment and passes the mirror again, you suddenly see the figure of a man. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Patrick is suddenly grabbed from behind
Patrick’s arguing with Sullivan. Suddenly, one of the soldiers standing around them is shot
Sloane and Melanie are talking. As Sloane turns around again, the doctor’s hand suddenly comes out of the bushes and grabs her
Patrick is looking for someone with the flashlight. When he turns around, there’s a man standing behind him. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Melanie runs with Sloane and Damon through the water in the cave. She grabs a rock and shines into a dark corner where suddenly a man is standing
After Damon says “Lets go” he is suddenly attacked by the doctor from the side
Sloane sees a double of her. After she says “I will never be you again”, the doctor attacks her
Patrick is suddenly attacked by Melanie with a knife
Sloane is attacked again by her double
Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in
Mike Myers climbs onto a car roof
A hand reaches through a window to grab lady
A hand smashes through car window
A silhouette watches Laurie walk away from the house
Tommy runs into Myers while at school
Laurie runs into Sheriff Brackett
A window smashes
Myers steps out from a car
Myers appears behind Annie in the car
A shadow crosses the bed while Lynda and Bob are in it
Bob opens door and is attacked by Myers
Dead Bob swings upside down from a door frame
Myers pops up from behind a sofa
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
A loud noise is heard behind him and something briefly flies by the camera
A girl appears laying behind him
The girl turns around to face him
The camera moves to a corpse and the corpse moves its eye
Camera cuts to a dead body
The lights go off and the man sees a dead person appear in front of him
The girl turns the lights off and several dead appear
A hand reaches out from the floor and grabs him
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her

movies.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abaddon Hotel

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement
The camera pans across to find one of the mannequins sitting at a table is now standing up facing the camera
A bloody woman with pale eyes appears in front of the camera. After holding on the shot for several seconds, the camera zooms in on her eyes
A clown mannequin’s arm and head moves
A door slams shut
A woman with pale eyes blinks, and a female screams
A wall suddenly explodes, revealing a red portal
The camera image glitches with an image of a clown’s face
A bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera
A man playing piano turns to reveal a bloody gash where his eye should be
Sarah bangs loudly on the door
The killer’s face appears at a window as Maddie tries to leave the house
The killer appears in front of a window
The killer appears around the corner of the house
The killer walks past a window
The killer appears at the window just as Sarah closes it
John suddenly gets up and tackles the killer

movies.title: I Am the Pretty Thing That Lives in the House

jump_scares.spoiler: The phone is yanked out of Lily’s hand
Lily turns around and sees Iris watching her from the doorway
Lily catches a glimpse of Polly in the reflection of the television screen
Lily gasps and the reflection of Polly can be seen in Lily’s eye
Accompanied by a high pitched noise, the lamp flickers and the scene abruptly changes
There is a sudden scene change to a man attacking a woman
There is another abrupt scene change
A loud scream can be heard
A torch shines on Susan as she walks towards the camera with an unnaturally wide smile on her face, as she gets closer her face suddenly appears directly in front of the camera. [Video]
A crack of thunder may startle some viewers
There is an abrupt cut to a man hitting a woman
Nikki shoots “The Phantom” several times, his face is then replaced with a disturbing image of Nikki’s own face. [Video]
During a very tense scene, Angela slowly approaches three mannequins by a window when one of them makes a hissing noise and briefly transforms into a person
An old man walks around the corner startling Jackson
During a tense scene, Angela turns around to see Elliot right beside her
A girl runs past the screen in the foreground
After Jackson says “Beth” one of the young girls appears in front of Jackson and Angela
Beth’s bloodied body appears by the window
A figure moves past the screen in front of Angela
A hand is placed on Angela’s shoulder
(Night #5) Katie suddenly wakes up out of bed gasping for air
(Night #5) The noise of something banging comes from another room
(Night #13) The couple wake up in their bed and a loud noise sounds from another room, followed by a bang
(Night #15) Micah enters the house again where he hears a bang
(Night #18) The bedroom door slams shut
(Night #18) The door slams shut again
Something bangs upstairs
(Night #21) Katie begins to scream loudly
(Night #21) Micah’s body is hurled at the screen from the doorway. (theatrical version) [Video]
(Night #21) Katie crawls up to the screen and lunges at it as her face begins to turn demonic. (theatrical version) [Video]
The scene abruptly cuts to a man struggling in a cage trap
After Zepp’s eye is revealed in Daina’s closet, the closet doors slam open
A masked man lunges at Dr. Gordon while he is on phone
A toy begins making laughing noises behind Adam
Adam’s camera flashes to reveal a masked man hiding in a cupboard
Dr. Gordon is electrocuted while he is sobbing on the floor
Kaylee drops her flashlight and screams as Kevin comes back from the bathroom
A hand grabs the doorframe and Kaylee screeches
Kaylee’s eyeless and mouthless face suddenly appears on screen with a loud droning whine sound
The shot of the toy phone cuts to a near identical shot where the phone is smiling wider and looking at the camera, accompanied by a loud ringing
A large gush of blood spills out of the hall accompanied by a scream. This shot repeats 3 times
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him
The clown (disguised as Tara), suddenly sits up behind Vicky
The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck
A dog barks, startling Ted
Sam jumps on Amelia’s bed
There is a loud thump followed by a scream
Amelia sees the Babadook through the window of Mrs. Roach’s house
The Babadook crawls across the ceiling above Amelia’s bed. [Video]
The Babadook comes down towards Amelia who then wakes up from a nightmare. [Video]
Amelia sees the Babadook through her rear view mirror
There is some loud inaudible talking just before Amelia wakes up
The Babadook stretches out his arms
A hat falls down into the fireplace
Amelia screams loudly at Sam
There is a loud roaring noise as something approaches Amelia

movies.title: The Babadook – Original Australian Blu-Ray at 25fps

jump_scares.spoiler: Sam jumps on Amelia’s bed
There is a loud thump followed by a scream
Amelia sees the Babadook through the window of Mrs. Roach’s house
The Babadook crawls across the ceiling above Amelia’s bed. [Video]
The Babadook comes down towards Amelia who then wakes up from a nightmare. [Video]
Amelia sees the Babadook through her rear view mirror
There is some loud inaudible talking just before Amelia wakes up
The Babadook stretches out his arms
A hat falls down into the fireplace
Amelia screams loudly at Sam
There is a loud roaring noise as something approaches Amelia
After a series of slow moving grayscale images, there is a sudden rattle and a face flies at the screen
An identical repeat of the last jump scare, but instead of a face, there is a burning portrait and a scream
There is a rattle and the stick-toy quickly flashes on the screen
As Rebecca runs through the dark attic, the cult leader jumps out in front of her
During the school play, a door beneath Charlie’s feet opens and he falls through, hanging himself in the process
Ryan pops up in front of the camera
Something smashes on the ground
There is a loud thudding noise
Pfeifer appears suddenly
The TV makes a loud noise and switches from static to an old news clip
Cassidy screams
Ryan sees a mask as he walks through the wardrobe room
A loud noise interrupts an argument between the group
Cassidy is pulled upwards by an unseen force
An unseen force throws Ryan off the ladder
A loud noise can be heard coming from the other side of the door
The camera spins around and focuses on the Hangman, who has appeared suddenly
Ryan’s cellphone drops to the floor as he is pulled up by his neck
A noose appears around Cassidy’s neck and she is pulled away suddenly. [Video]
The Hangman can be seen standing begin Pfeifer
The Hangman lunges at Pfeifer and Reese on the stairs
Ryan’s hanging body suddenly appears in front of the camera
The spotlight turns on suddenly
A policeman enters a bedroom, the camera moves to the bed where Alexis is combing Pfeifer’s hair
A policeman is thrown against a wall, the camera then moves back to Alexis and Pfeifer who are looking at the hangman who then attacks the cameraman
As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out
When Thomas turns around, two people in cape stand behind him
Lindsay opens he curtain to reveal Heiter standing there with a gun
During a tense scene Lindsay accidentally kicks a metallic object lying on the ground
Katsuro suddenly stabs Heiter in the foot
Kranz hears a loud gunshot coming from somewhere in the house
A man’s hand suddenly appears inside Megan’s car holding a cigarette lighter. [Video]
Samantha is startled by the doorbell as she climbs the stairs
A loud thump can be heard on the other side of the attic door
A grimacing bloody face briefly appears on the screen several times
Claire turns around and is startled by Adam
As Adam takes a photograph, a creature appears in the woods
Adam looks up and Colm is standing on the road
The car trunk suddenly slams down on Adam
A shadowy figure moves past a window
There is a high pitched squawk and Adam shoots his gun
Adam shuts the car bonnet which reveals several creatures standing behind him
Something comes through the keyhole that Adam is looking through and pierces his eye
Adam looks through a crack in the door and sees one of the creatures
A hand breaks through the attic floor
Claire looks up and sees a creature at the window
One of the creatures squeals at Claire
Finn’s face suddenly turns demonic
Adam bangs loudly on the door behind Claire
Adam suddenly grabs Claire’s ankle
Cora screams at Adam
A creature stands up behind Adam and impales him through the stomach
During  mid-credits scene, we see the logging truck drive off while calming music plays only to reveal the creature screeching at the camera
When Cecilia flees the house, she runs into a dog bowl after she came out of the room with the suits. Although the bowl is visible, the loud bang is very shocking
After Cecilia gets into the car, her husband runs out of the forest and hits the car window
Sydney is suddenly slapped by the invisible man while talking to Cecilia
As Cecilia tilts the bucket of white paint from the attic, the invisible man suddenly appears right in front of her
After Cecilia turns off the tap in the kitchen and looks around she is suddenly grabbed by the invisible man
The invisible man suddenly appears beside Cecilia under the trunk
Will suddenly swerves to avoid something on the road
Will stands up and smashes his glass
David shoots Miguel
A bloodied Sadie runs into Will
Will slaps the gun out of Pruitt’s hand
One of the workers appears in front of the camera
A sphinx creature runs across the screen while shrieking
A large brick falls on Zahir after he says “What the hell is wrong with you, man?
The sphinx runs across the screen again
The Anubis appears out of the hole and begins to pull the soldier in
The large hanging brick that Holden is investigating falls down
Holden is impaled by the Anubis after he says “We have to keep going.
The Anubis quickly turns toward the camera
The Anubis walks around the corner while growling
Fitzie places his hand over Nora’s mouth
As the camera’s light comes back on the Anubis jumps towards it
The Anubis jumps out of the hole and grabs Nora
After Nora calls out to Fitzie the Anubis crushes his face
As the boy turns around The Anubis jumps at him
The man behind the camera hits the little girl with it
Ed hits the driving man with something
The lights turn on to reveal Ed’s reflection in the window, startling Tim
There is a loud cut to a dead body
Tangles’ audio cable is ripped away
The frozen image of the creatures face appears on the camera footage
The guard is dragged out of sight around a corner by an unseen creature
As Peter climbs through a small opening, he is suddenly pulled away by the creature
The creature rushes at the camera
The creature that Natasha is following turns around and breaks the camera
The mannequin on the floor springs up as the man touches it
A mannequin suddenly crashes through the window
The man opens a door, and a cackling mannequin jumps out at him from inside
The mirror suddenly smashes by itself
The curtain suddenly flies up by itself
There is a sudden cut to a creepy mannequin sitting on a chair with a loud sound cue
The mannequin opens its arms and springs forward towards the camera
The killer steps in front of Molly from the side accompanied by a sound cue
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
As the friends zoom in on the dead body on Google maps, the killer suddenly turns up and faces the camera
After a few seconds of silenty zooming in on the killer, a phone suddenly starts vibrating, scaring the group
The killer unexpectedly jumps out of a garbage can
The car’s back camera turns on to reveal the killer standing outside
The camera turns back on to reveal the killer now standing right in front of it
The killer jumps out from the back seat and grabs Phil
Fiona approaches a door curtain to peek at the other side and it’s suddenly pulled open
There is a sudden pounding on the door
The camera focuses on a framed photo for several seconds, suddenly the charred face of a woman appears in the reflection of the frame
The charred woman runs at the electrician
Joe is attacked from behind by another charred figure
A picture falls off the wall, startling Anne
The charred woman grabs Harry
Daniella sees the charred woman in the rear vision mirror, she is then impaled through the stomach
A door slams shut
Paul sees two charred figures in the doorway, he then turns to his wife in bed but there is a shrivelled corpse in her place
Jacob is pushed back on his chair by an unseen force
May is shot in the head as she opens the door and blood splatters onto the camera
A man is impaled through the stomach by one of the charred people
A man is grabbed around the ankle by one of the charred figures
